languages.text: "Что ты натворил{mf||а}, мон-кай? Я не просила тебя быть мои щитом, а уж смертоносным копьем и подавно! Теперь... еще одна бессмертная душа отправилась в пасть Той, Что Жаждет. Поистине твой примитивный род не в силах осознать ценность жизни".

traits.locale_text: "Что ты натворил{mf||а}, мон-кай? Я не просила тебя быть мои щитом, а уж смертоносным копьем и подавно! Теперь... еще одна бессмертная душа отправилась в пасть Той, Что Жаждет. Поистине твой примитивный род не в силах осознать ценность жизни".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."
languages.original_text: "Что ты натворил{mf||а}, мон-кай? Я не просила тебя быть мои щитом, а уж смертоносным копьем и подавно! Теперь... еще одна бессмертная душа отправилась в пасть Той, Что Жаждет. Поистине твой примитивный род не в силах осознать ценность жизни".

traits.locale_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of Her Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué has hecho, mon-keigh? ¡Yo no te he pedido que seas mi escudo, y mucho menos mi lanza mortal! Ya es tarde... otra alma inmortal ha sido engullida por las fauces de la Sedienta. Desde luego tu primitiva especie es incapaz de apreciar el valor de una vida».
languages.original_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué has hecho, mon-keigh? ¡Yo no te he pedido que seas mi escudo, y mucho menos mi lanza mortal! Ya es tarde... otra alma inmortal ha sido engullida por las fauces de la Sedienta. Desde luego tu primitiva especie es incapaz de apreciar el valor de una vida».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何ということをしたのだ、モン＝ケイ？我が盾になれとあなたに頼んだ覚えはない。ましてや、死の槍になれとは言うまでもないんだ！これで…また一人、不滅の魂がかの渇きたる女のマウの中へと消えた。あなたのような原始的な種族は、命の価値が理解できないのだな」
languages.original_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."

traits.locale_text: 「何ということをしたのだ、モン＝ケイ？我が盾になれとあなたに頼んだ覚えはない。ましてや、死の槍になれとは言うまでもないんだ！これで…また一人、不滅の魂がかの渇きたる女のマウの中へと消えた。あなたのような原始的な種族は、命の価値が理解できないのだな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你到底在做什么啊，猴子？我从来没让你成为我的盾牌，更别说成为我的致命之矛了！如今……又一个不朽的灵魂被饥渴女士吞噬。像你们这样的原始种族，确实无法理解生命的价值。”
languages.original_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."

traits.locale_text: “你到底在做什么啊，猴子？我从来没让你成为我的盾牌，更别说成为我的致命之矛了！如今……又一个不朽的灵魂被饥渴女士吞噬。像你们这样的原始种族，确实无法理解生命的价值。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Qu'avez-vous fait, mon-keigh ? Je ne vous ai jamais demandé d'être mon bouclier, encore moins ma lance mortelle ! À présent... une autre âme immortelle a disparu dans la gueule de l'Assoiffée. Votre espèce primitive ne comprendra décidément jamais la valeur d'une vie. »
languages.original_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'avez-vous fait, mon-keigh ? Je ne vous ai jamais demandé d'être mon bouclier, encore moins ma lance mortelle ! À présent... une autre âme immortelle a disparu dans la gueule de l'Assoiffée. Votre espèce primitive ne comprendra décidément jamais la valeur d'une vie. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Was habt Ihr getan, Chem-Pan-Sey? Ich habe Euch nie darum gebeten, mein Schild zu sein, geschweige denn mein tödlicher Speer! Jetzt ... ist eine weitere unsterbliche Seele im Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, gelandet. Eure primitive Art ist einfach nicht fähig, den Wert eines Lebens zu ermessen."
languages.original_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."

traits.locale_text: "Was habt Ihr getan, Chem-Pan-Sey? Ich habe Euch nie darum gebeten, mein Schild zu sein, geschweige denn mein tödlicher Speer! Jetzt ... ist eine weitere unsterbliche Seele im Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, gelandet. Eure primitive Art ist einfach nicht fähig, den Wert eines Lebens zu ermessen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne yaptın mon-keigh? Bırak ölüm saçan bir mızrağı, bana kalkan olmanı bile istememiştim! Şimdiyse... Ölümsüz bir ruh daha Susayan'ın ağzına atılmış oldu. Hayatın kıymeti, o ilkel türünün kavrayabileceklerinin hakikaten de çok ötesinde."
languages.original_text: "What have you done, mon-keigh? I never asked you to be my shield, let alone my deadly spear! Now... yet another immortal soul has gone into the maw of She Who Thirsts. It really is beyond your primitive kind to grasp the value of a life."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yaptın mon-keigh? Bırak ölüm saçan bir mızrağı, bana kalkan olmanı bile istememiştim! Şimdiyse... Ölümsüz bir ruh daha Susayan'ın ağzından geçip gitti. Hayatın kıymeti, senin o ilkel türünün kavrayabileceklerinin hakikaten de çok ötesinde."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
